Package info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.api

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccountApi
    An Account has to be created for at least one manager or developer.
    Api
    With the API some application information can be queried like the current date and time.
    DonationApi
    A donation stands for a real world purpose.
    GoalApi
    A Goal comprises one or more tasks and has to be completed if the player wants to earn the connected awards.
    MarketPlaceApi
    The marketplace gives players the opportunity to offer tasks that have to be completed by their colleagues so that they are able to fulfil those tasks and obtain the respective reward.
    OrganisationApi
    An Organisation represents for example a specific company or an association which represents a group of people belonging together and which are participating in the gamification process.
    PlayerApi
    A player represents a user in the gamification application, eg. an employee of an organisation or a customer.
    PlayerGroupApi
    Players can be assigned to a group by its creation or at a later point in time.
    PlayerLevelApi
    API for player level related services.
    PresentApi
    Players in a gamification application can send presents to each other, whereby one or more players can be a recipient.
    QrApi  
    ResponseSurrogate<T>
    This surrogate is used to add to each returned object an error field.
    RewardApi
    A Reward will be awarded in dependent of the goal for a group or one person after a person fulfilled a task.
    RoleApi
    A role describes which members of an organisation is allowed to do or see particular elements of the engine such as to fulfil a particular task and get its rewards.
    RuleApi
    With a Goalrule can be defined which tasks and if all or only one task have to be fulfilled to reach a goal.
    TaskApi
    A Task is the basic module and represents for example a specific activity.
    ValidateUtils
